AzureAD.TenantId: Guid tenant id for the organization
AzureAD.AppPassword: The Azure AD app password/secret (better to be in KeyVault)
AzureAD.HostDomain: The host domain for the application ex: richdizz.ngrok.io or richdizz.azurewebsites.net
AzureAD.Cert: The base 64 encoded certificate for decrypting resource data from graph (better to be in KeyVault)
AzureAD.CertPrivateKey: The private key for the certificate for decrypting resource data from graph (better to be in KeyVault)
